title: Clarify Purpose of Analysis and Insights Directories
description: The .claude/analysis/ and .claude/insights/ directories contain some files but their purpose and usage patterns are unclear. Need to document their role or consolidate/remove if redundant.
completion_notes: Created comprehensive README.md files in both .claude/analysis/ and .claude/insights/ directories clarifying their distinct purposes. Analysis directory contains meta-analytical reports and audits of the repository itself (instruction audits, performance reports) - answers 'how well is the system working?'. Insights directory contains learned patterns and actionable intelligence extracted from analysis data (pattern catalogs, success recipes) - answers 'what should we do?'. Key distinction: Analysis = data collection/reports, Insights = pattern recognition/actionable learnings, Reference = how-to guides, Context = project understanding. Both serve template developers for continuous improvement cycle.
notes: Directories exist with some content but no clear documentation on when to use them vs other directories like reference/ or context/.
decision_rationale: Unclear directory purposes create confusion about where to put different types of documentation.
